title: Bug 6125 - JAR Packager Reports Open Files Very Late
description: This bug report is related to the behavior of the JAR packager in handling unsaved files during JAR creation.
OB: The observed behavior is not explicitly mentioned, but it can be inferred that when attempting to create a JAR file with unsaved files, the process fails without providing an option to save the files.
EB: The expected behavior should allow the user to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If this is not supported, there should be a dialog prompt that allows the user to save or discard changes before proceeding.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are not provided, but the problem can be encountered when attempting to create a JAR file with unsaved changes, which results in the reported behavior.
